name: PolterHeist (itch) (Jaiden Gerig, Jeroen Kornips, Jessmer, Michael Kirby)
name_original: PolterHeist (itch) (Jaiden Gerig, Jeroen Kornips, Jessmer, Michael Kirby)
description:
The PolterHeist, is a stealth puzzle game where you play as a ghost that possesses security guards to steal items from the Museum but be warned, time is against you and you my find things get out of control fast!

Keyboard Controls:
WASD = To move around
E = Interact/Possess

Made By:

  • Michael Kirby -Art
  • Jaiden Gerig - Programming
  • Jeroen Kornips - Programming
  • Jess Buscema - Sound

Created For The GMTK 2020 Game Jam
